Uses of Package
controllers

Packages that use controllers
Package
Description
client
 
controllers
 
  • Classes in controllers used by client
    Class
    Description
    AbstractController
    Super abstract class for all controllers All the controllers inherit from this class and the method start
  • Classes in controllers used by controllers
    Class
    Description
    AbstractController
    Super abstract class for all controllers All the controllers inherit from this class and the method start
    AbstractOrderController
    AbstractOrderController is a class for the order process its added event handler to the stage, the event restart the timer when mouse move.
    CartCellController
    CartCellController class is the controller class for the CartCell FXML file.
    CatlogCellController
    CatalogCellController class is the controller class for the CatalogCell FXML file.
    OrderViewController
    OrderViewController class is the controller class for the OrderViewList FXML file.
